body_content.explanation: based on the belief that truth and right and wrong can only be judged in relation to other things and that nothing can be true or right in all situations:
examples: Like the majority of people, they take a relativistic view of the world.
People with religious beliefs often have a desire for certainty in a society that they consider too relativistic.

body_content.explanation: relating to relativity (= either of two theories of physics giving the relationship between space, time, and energy, especially for two objects moving in different ways):
examples: A number of scientists made contributions to the relativistic theory of gravity.
The paper includes special relativistic accounts of thermodynamics.
